math.root: Get the root of a number
math.eval: Do a math problem with a variable, and assign that variable
math.notate: Convert a number into scientific notation
math.area: Get the area of a 2D shape
math.volume: Get the volume of a 3D shape
math.solve: Solve a math problem with an un-named variable.
math.simplify: Converts an Algebraic equation into a simple equation

mod.kick: Kick a member from the server
mod.ban: Ban a member from the server
mod.config: Configure the bot for your server

ptoe.pt: Get information about an element on the PToE
